item.title: No Matter How Hard Democrats Try, There Is No Such Thing As ‘Biblical Evidence’ For Abortion
item.description: Just because Jesus didn’t specifically use the word ‘abortion’ in his short ministry on Earth doesn’t mean he endorses it.

item.title: Pentagon Replaces Naval Academy Leader Who Oversaw Racist Affirmative Action Policies

item.title: 4 Reasons Chip And Joanna Gaines Shouldn’t ‘Normalize’ Gay Surrogacy
item.description: Same-sex couples must always seek to 'normalize' their families for the very reason they are not normal and never will be.

item.title: Trump Scores Big SCOTUS Victory Over Department Of Education
item.description: Trump’s attorney in the High Court, the Missourian John Sauer, has set a record for quickly and repeatedly prevailing.

item.title: 5 Years Ago, The Russia Collusion Hoax Fell Apart
item.description: Five years ago today, the so-called 'primary sub-source' behind the infamous Steele dossier was identified, and the entire hoax collapsed.
